Key Match Events: Swiss defender Nico Elvedi got handed a red card in the 52nd minute
Patrick Dorgu scored the first goal for Denmark in the 82nd minute
Granit Xhaka was given Switzerland's second red card in the match
Pierre-Emile Høgbjerg sealed the victory with a goal 2 minutes into stoppage time
Pre-Game Insights: Carl, a Danish supporter, had high hopes for his team in this year’s Nations League
Post-Match Reflections: Denmark gained 3 points in the standing, and now sit atop of their group
